subject: Re: for Margaret   Face in the water

full_text:
Thanks, W.  I really feel like someone in spirit whispered the suggestion in my ear to try 
this method.  So glad I was paying attention.  And I'm glad I was able to overcome my 
technical challenges ... having never transferred video to a computer before, nor worked 
with any video software, it was a bit of an uphill battle for me in the beginning.  LOL - it 
took me hours, not kidding, to figure out how to make and convert the video for YouTube.  
Thank goodness old dogs actually can learn new tricks.  ;-)

Margaret
